statements.select: SELECT * FROM [dbo].[InvoiceCODetail] WHERE invoiceid = #value# order by Inumber
select * from invoicecodetail where productid=#pid# and invoiceid in(select invoiceId from invoiceco where invoicedate between #startdate# and #enddate#) order by invoiceid
statements.update: UPDATE InvoiceCODetail SET InvoiceCODetail.InvoiceCODetailPrice = #InvoiceCODetailPrice#,InvoiceCODetail.InvoiceCODetailMoney = #InvoiceCODetailMoney# WHERE InvoiceCODetail.InvoiceCODetailId = #InvoiceCODetailId#
UPDATE InvoiceCO SET InvoiceTax = #InvoiceTax# AND InvoiceTotal = #InvoiceTotal# AND InvoiceHeji = #InvoiceHeji# WHERE InvoiceId = #InvoiceId#
